original_title: The Voice That Rocked America: The Dick Biondi Story
overview: THE VOICE THAT ROCKED AMERICA is an one-hour documentary about Top 40 radio personality Dick Biondi. Dick's powerful connection with his audience has endured for decades, and the bands he promoted have never forgotten his generosity. Dick's story will be told through archival photos and footage, recreations, and interviews with recording artists, broadcasters, fans, friends and Dick Biondi himself. The film is narrated by Pam, whose life was changed when she met her teenage idol.
tagline: The life and career of Chicago's most iconic disc jockey
title: The Voice That Rocked America: The Dick Biondi Story
